newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico's TIIE 28-day rate falls to 22.94 pct.
newsitem.headline: Mexico's TIIE 28-day rate falls to 22.94 pct.

text.p: Mexico's 28-day interbank TIIE interest rate fell by 14 basis points to 22.94 percent on Wednesday, from 23.08 percent on Tuesday, Banco de Mexico said.
The 91-day TIIE gained 19.50 basis points to 22.4450 percent on Wednesday from 22.2500 percent the week before.
The 28-day TIIP meanwhile increased by 66.63 basis points to 22.9663 percent on Wednesday from 22.3000 percent the week before.
The TIIE is a market-weighted average interbank rate that is replacing the TIIP, an average interbank rate.
